item.title: Who and what are in the Epstein files?
item.description: High-profile figures, including Bill Clinton and Michael Jackson, can be seen in the long-awaited files.

item.title: Photo of Andrew lying on laps at Sandringham in new Epstein files
item.description: The photo appears to have been taken in the saloon room at Sandringham, the royal estate in Norfolk.

item.title: Strictly stars gear up for final, with Tess and Claudia set to bow out
item.description: Celebrities Amber Davies, George Clarke and Karen Carney are vying to be crowned winners.

item.title: Murder investigation after man, 55, shot in street
item.description: Officers are called to reports of a shooting on West End Close, Stonebridge, at 21:35 GMT on Friday.

item.title: US carries out 'massive' strike against IS in Syria
item.description: The US says it struck dozens of targets across Syria in response to last week's deadly Islamic State attack on US forces there.
